title: 塞尔达MOD的攻略问题
author: a814921147
txt_content: 我杀完了前两个地牢，就是那个Boss是骷髅的那个。然后要干什么？走到了沙漠，那个古希腊似的宫殿里边什么都没有。请高手回答，另外请把觉得有难度的地方透露一下，不用透露全部。

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
第三個迷宮在湖底, 下水吧... 裡頭有些小謎題

Water Temple
The entry of the temple is at the bottom of Hylia Lake. There are small enigmas inside it.
Boss : Giant Skeleton. 


沙漠的希臘神殿是第四個迷宮, 同樣有謎待解, 注意拉桿可能有點問題, 無法開門時, 每個拉桿拉兩次吧... 

Desert Temple
The entry of the temple is in the desert. There's a maze with an enigma inside it. There are some problems in the maze with levers. If the door doesn't open, click 2 times on each lever.
Boss : Ghast. 


第五個迷宮, 在沙漠再過去的森林裡, 同樣有謎題與平台挑戰(跳格子嗎?)... 

Ground Temple
The entry of the temple is in the lost woods, after the desert. There are many enigmas and platform challenges.
Boss : Giant Zombie. 

然後... 等作者補完後面的(預計)三個地圖吧...

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 要把它引到那些刺上 讓他被爆菊而亡- -
